metadata.prompt: A stylist in a supply store, looking closely at a disinfectant bottle, like a detective examining evidence. The shot is fun and energetic.
A close-up on a disinfectant label. An animated magnifying glass moves over the word "Bactericidal," which glows. A friendly bacterium icon appears and is zapped.
The animated magnifying glass moves over the word "Fungicidal," which glows. A friendly fungus icon appears and is zapped.
The animated magnifying glass moves over the word "Virucidal," which glows. A friendly virus icon appears and is zapped.
A shot of a different product label that only says "Antibacterial." A big, red, animated 'X' stamps over the bottle.
A graphic showing three green checkmarks next to the words "Bactericidal," "Fungicidal," and "Virucidal." The checkmarks appear one by one with satisfying 'ding' sound effects.
A confident stylist holding up the correct, compliant bottle of disinfectant with a proud smile. The salon behind them is bright and professional.
